title: IIU invites applications for short language courses
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 19 (APP):The Faculty of Languages and Literature at the International Islamic University (IIU) has invited applications from interested students for admission in diploma, certificate, and short courses in English, Persian, Chinese, and Urdu by January 31 to enhance language skills.
The International Islamic University Islamabad (IIUI) offers English programs, including a 6-month Diploma, 3-month Certificate, and 2-month courses in academic writing. It also provides IELTS and TOEFL preparatory certificates spanningÂ  three months each.
According to the sources, separate 6-month diploma and 3-month certificate courses were offered in Urdu, Persian, and Chinese, targeting various proficiency levels to enhance language skills effectively.
The fee for the 6-month diploma courses in English, Urdu, Persian, and Chinese is Rs 24,000, while the 3-month certificate courses cost Rs 14,000, and the 2-month courses are Rs 12,000.
Separate male classes are scheduled in the morning from 9:30 am to 11:30 am and in the evening from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm, Monday to Saturday. Female classes will run in the morning from 9:30 am to 11:30 am and in the afternoon from 3:00 pm to 5:00 pm.
For more details, please contact the coordinator at 0344-5007338 or visit the website at www.iiu.edu.pk.
